comments:
When trying to edit a shared run configuration (stored in CVS), sometimes the 
changes can't be applied.  Once in this state, all CVS operations stop working 
(dialog says that the current operation is blocked because of some background 
operation).  When shutting down eclipse, there is an error (the details just 
say 'Internal Error').  My guess is that this happens only with launch files 
that have CVS editors on them (we have watch/edit turned on).  This seems to be 
happening with 3.0M7 (wasn't happening with previous versions i.e. 3.0M5).
